name: The Amazing Adventures of EZ & PZ (asmomajalahti)
name_original: The Amazing Adventures of EZ & PZ (asmomajalahti)
description:
The Amazing Adventures of EZ & PZ (asmomajalahti) is an educational game developed by asmomajalahti. It was originally released in 2022.
You can play The Amazing Adventures of EZ & PZ (asmomajalahti) on PC, macOS, Linux and Android. The game is sold via itch.io.
